content: we love our shawls and scarves here at handknit yarn studio but sometimes you just need a cowl tracy wrote this pattern to make use of *lang yarns luna* a unique chained yarn that is lofty fluffy and super soft this pattern is perfect for the beginner knitter who wants to move beyond the rectangle and the split neck makes this cowl sit straight and comfortably around your neck using 6 5mm needles it also knits up quickly making it the perfect knit gift
